title.line1: Every Great Tech Quest Deserves the Best Services

main.description: Legendary loot for all your IT adventure needs

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.description: Our Consultation services are designed to guide you through the complexities of IT and sustainability. We provide expert advice on how to create and implement sustainable IT strategies, optimize resources, and align technology with environmental goals. Whether you're rethinking your digital infrastructure or looking to enhance your company’s eco-credentials, our consultants offer insightful, customized guidance every step of the way.

description.part1: Our Professional Services are like a skilled ranger guild, guiding you through every twist and turn of your business quest. Whether you need expert strategy to blaze a new trail, hands-on help to sharpen your operations, or direction to keep your IT in line with sustainability goals, we’re ready.
description.part2: From mapping out your journey to seeing you safely through, we ensure you’re equipped with the right tools, insights, and support to hit your targets—without missing a beat.

description.part1: From energy-efficient gear to highly repairable, rock-solid options, our offerings make sure your tech arsenal is tough, cost-effective, and ready to brawl—without draining all the gold in your stash. Partnering with us means smashing through environmental impact, fortifying your defenses, and crafting a greener, smarter, future-ready workplace as sharp as a berserker’s axe.
description.part2: As a Sustainable Technology Provider (STP), we arm your business with eco-friendly hardware, software, cloud solutions, and AI-driven tools to help you crush sustainability challenges with the strength of a battle-ready berserker.

mspTiers.title: campaigns for your MSP journey
mspTiers.subtitle: Here's a breakdown for each tier with a focus on progression in service depth and sustainability.

description.primary: Our entry-level MSP package, The Scout, sets your business on the right path with essential IT support and a sustainable focus. Think of it as your trusty companion for the journey ahead.
description.secondary: Perfect for companies just starting their quest into modern, sustainable IT management—it keeps you prepared for whatever challenges lie ahead.

points.1: Proactive system monitoring to catch and resolve issues before they impact your business.
points.2: Regular updates to keep your system current and secure.
points.3: Core cybersecurity defenses to protect against common threats.
points.4: Support services to provide timely assistance whenever you need it
points.5: Basic backup and disaster recovery to safeguard your data and ensure rapid recovery in case of disruptions.

description.primary: Building on the strong foundation of The Scout, The Rangers package offers expanded support for those ready to venture deeper into the IT wilderness.
description.secondary: This package is designed for those seeking to balance modernization, security, and sustainability—cutting down on waste, boosting system resilience, and staying nimble on any quest.

points.1: Advanced backup and disaster recovery for robust data protection
points.2: Remote troubleshooting to resolve issues quickly and efficiently
points.3: Device energy optimization to reduce waste and boost efficiency
points.4: Advanced data management solutions to keep your systems organized and effecive.
points.5: Network and infrastructure management for enhanced connectivity and reliability.
points.6: Compliance and regulatory support to keep you in line with industry standards.
points.7: Cloud services management for seamless integration.

description.primary: For those ready to lead the charge, The Vanguard delivers end-to-end MSP services tailored for champions committed to total transformation. This top-tier package builds on every benefit of The Scout and The Rangers, adding a suite of advanced features designed to push your business to the front lines of innovation and sustainability.
description.secondary: The Vanguard transforms your business into a trailblazer of IT modernization, delivering custom, high-powered solutions that supercharge efficiency, reinforce your defenses, and champion a greener future. With this top-tier package, you’ll crush obstacles, outpace the competition, and lead with innovation—because why settle for following the pack when you can redefine the quest?

points.1: Priority support to ensure your needs are always addressed first.
points.2: Custom IT strategy crafting tailored specifically to your business goals.
points.3: Advanced cloud management and optimization for seamless, efficient cloud operations.
points.4: Vendor management to streamline interactions with third-party providers.
points.5: Advanced automation solutions to increase productivity and reduce manual work.
points.6: Deep sustainability audits to evaluate and enhance your environmental impact.
points.7: Advanced threat hunting and penetration testing to safeguard against complex security threats.
points.8: Tailored end-user training and education to maximize security awareness and tech adoption across your team.

addOns.title: Do you need extra equipment for your journey?
addOns.subtitle: Seeking flexible support outside of a package? Here are our add-on services that can be tailored to meet specific needs without a long-term commitment.

reseller.title: Reseller
reseller.description: As a Reseller, we provide access to a carefully curated selection of eco-friendly hardware, software, and tools that support sustainability in IT. From energy-efficient devices to environmentally responsible software solutions, we help your business choose technology that aligns with your sustainability values. Through our reseller services, you gain reliable access to quality products that reduce your environmental footprint and promote a greener workplace.

companions.title: Want to take a look at our companions?
